game_description: Immerse yourself in the future of entertainment, shopping and customer service with Orange. Personalize your avatar, invite your friends and immerse yourself in a virtual experience of Orange services. Discover the online store with exclusive promotions on Orange products. Make an appointment with our customer service and sales staff and meet them directly in the online store so they can introduce you to Orange offers and answer all your questions. Browse a selection of immersive 360-degree experiences: - Content from top studios - Movies, animated shorts and documentaries - Live and replay events and concerts And in the company of your friends!
review_1: Very ordinary graphics, can’t do very much unless you sign up with an Orange account to which I’m not a customer and don’t plan to be.
